channel.title: Trixie repository
channel.description:
Patrick, this repo specified in security-misc installation section, but repo does not work. I thought you were testing transition to debian trixie https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Security-misc#Installation_of_security-misc **5.** Add Kicksecure APT repository. `echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/derivative.asc] https://deb.kicksecure.com trixie main contrib non-free" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list`
https://deb.kicksecure.com trixie Release 404 Not Found

item.title: Trixie repository
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Kicksecure port to newer Debian codename (major release upgrade) usually only gets started once the newer Debian codename has been blessed stable by Debian.

Until then, the newer codename remains unsupported.

Kicksecure â€“ 12 Oct 24

Undocumented, Untested or Unsupported Features

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become a Contributor / Apply Self Support First Policy / Purchase Support.

item.title: Trixie repository
item.dc:creator: sam
item.description:
Patrick, this repo specified in security-misc installation section, but repo does not work. I thought you were testing transition to debian trixie security-misc: Enhance Miscellaneous Security Settings
5. Add Kicksecure APT repository.
echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/derivative.asc] https://deb.kicksecure.com trixie main contrib non-free" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/derivative.list

https://deb.kicksecure.com trixie Release
404 Not Found

Read full topic
